content.p: Associate Professor, Joshua Yap has started teaching in universities in 2004. He has been teaching modules with various subjects from seed science to cell biology, plant biotechnology, biodiversity, cryopreservation and… read more His research work started off with the interest of propagating plants via in vitro techniques, and later extended to using in vitro technologies as a platform to cryopreserve various… read more Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
